                           java.io.File dest,
                           int pixelHeight)
Purpose: To resize the first image from a directory of a directory of images, and create them in a spesified folder Eg. dest is C:\trousers c:\trousers Goo Face face1.jpg face2.jpg Pants pants1.jpg pants2.jpg Becomes c:\trousers tface1.jpg tpants1.jpg Goo Face pic1.jpg pic2.jpg Pants pic1.jpg pic2.jpg
